attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

Copyright 2023 GAMLS. All rights reserved.

data.description: Welcome to your peaceful oasis in the heart of the Belmont Hills Community! This meticulously maintained 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom townhome combines modern living with an idyllic atmosphere. Completely electric and thoughtfully designed, this home offers comfort and style in equal measure.    As you step inside, the main level welcomes you with pristine hardwood flooring that stretches throughout the open layout. The kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring granite countertops and a full suite of sleek Stainless Steel appliances.     Beyond the glass french doors, you'll find a privately fenced backyard, perfect for relaxing, gardening, or entertaining.    Upstairs, the master bedroom awaits, providing ample space and a walk-in closet to accommodate your wardrobe. The master bathroom is a luxurious retreat, boasting a deep soaking tub, a separate shower, and a double vanity with perfectly placed lighting for your daily grooming rituals.    Additionally, there are two additional bedrooms on the upper level with a private bath for guests, home office, or fitness. With plenty of natural light and versatile living space, these rooms can adapt to your changing needs.    Living in this townhome means enjoying the wonderful amenities of the Belmont Hills Community, including a community park for recreation, sidewalks ideal for leisurely strolls, and nearby shopping for all your needs. MARTA transportation is easily accessible within a 15-minute walk, simplifying your daily commute.    If you're seeking a little adventure, you'll appreciate the short drive to Stonecrest and the vibrant attractions of Intown Atlanta, offering a wide array of entertainment, dining, and cultural experiences.    Don't miss the opportunity to call this tranquil townhome your own, where tranquility meets convenience in the Belmont Hills Community. Come and see it for yourself today!
